description.black-white:
The user creates a bizarre area in which
Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def
stats are swapped for five turns.

effect.full: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
effect.shortEffect: All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
